channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Abandoned vehicle, 20th July
item.description:
This vehicle has no MOT and has been abandoned outside my property at 203 Riverdale Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Riverdale Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Stairway on bridge with overgrown weeds etc, 20th July
item.description:
A footbridge that crosses railway line is becoming overgrown with weeds etc. Growing mainly on the walls this is reducing the effectiveness of the handrails for people of all ages to use.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Thrift, Petts Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pavement is uneven making it difficult for my disabled wife to use, 20th July
item.description:
The pavement in Stuart Mantle way between Detling "road and the service road of Edinburgh Court is all uneven with broken slabs and slabs that have risen. It makes it difficult for my wife who uses a mobility aid (rolling walking frame) to get along the street. I would imagine it is a trip hazard for others.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stuart Mantle Way, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
